run_organization.description: Configuration for organizing test generation runs with single consolidated directory and verbal timestamps

consolidation_policy.description: ALL outputs from ALL agents and phases must be created in the SAME run directory
consolidation_policy.agent_outputs: Individual agent results saved as separate files in main directory (no subdirectories)
consolidation_policy.phase_results: Each phase saves results to main run directory with descriptive filenames

folder_contents.test_cases_only.md: Environment-agnostic test cases with 3-section format (Description, Setup, Test Table)
folder_contents.complete_analysis_report.md: Comprehensive analysis with feature summary, citations, evidence, test environment details
folder_contents.feature_availability_analysis.md: Agent-specific feature detection and availability analysis results
folder_contents.run_metadata.json: Complete run metadata including all agents used, timing, quality scores, file inventory

directory_creation_rules.main_run_directory: Created once at framework start with numerical timestamp
directory_creation_rules.agent_outputs: All agents MUST save to main directory (no separate agent directories)
directory_creation_rules.phase_results: All phases MUST save to main directory with descriptive filenames
directory_creation_rules.consolidation_required: If agents create separate directories, results MUST be moved to main directory
directory_creation_rules.cleanup_policy: Remove empty agent directories after consolidation
